name: Cryofected
description:
Cryofected is a semi-survival game where you have to find your way out of

an infected spaceship making minimal interaction to your infected surroundings

cause they will kill you instantly and every time you die you start the level

with new effects.

Controls: WASD or arrow to move

in case you encounter a bug or are stuck please use these controls:

     "/" takes you to the main menu

     "\" restarts the level

Made in 48 hrs for BYOG Game Jam 2021

Theme: reset and minimal interaction
